Title: Trou Normand
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: A totem pole of human bodies ranging from freshly killed to decades old are found on a beach and while Graham is investigating the crime scene, he suddenly finds himself in Lecter's office,...
